_header: When thou sees in Here hart I-reared
_description: The Here prophecy — five rhyming lines

Unknown.Transcription:
Zan zu seches in here hert yreretZan sulen Hengles in þre be
                    ydeledZat han sale into Hyrlande alto lade wayaZat hozer in to Poile
                    mid pride bileveZe thirde in hayre haughen hert
                    all…ydreghe
